Description: Herfy Food Services Co (known as: Herfy Foods) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since February 2010. Herfy Foods operates within the Consumer Services sector focusing on Restaurants. Herfy Foods is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in March 1981.
